title: picnic spot
review: good place to spend some time. visit early morning is good. it is a private resort on way of kampty fall. not maintain good but i liked.

title: Good
review: Nice place to visit and if you will come with friends it's  nice vist and lake mist located in kempty fall road nice time to visit in june

title: This is just inside the Company Garden, its not a separate place
review: the view is good

title: good but not must see
review: if you have spare time you can visit. it is in the way of kempty fall. this can be a good picnic spot because it is very peaceful

title: Lake mist
review: Very very calm place. Water is really clean. A place where you can sit for hours and relax. A must place in mussorie

title: milky misty
review: Really mystic misty lake with milky water flowing and calming you from your busy day, comfortable and clean environment

title: Nice place
review: The place is very good and has nice parking and food it also has nice environment and greenery around

title: best
review: Loved lot to visit here is like heavan we all spend lots of quality time there. wanna come again and again

title: Leisure Time
review: Spent a couple of days at Lake Mist ... very friendly staff, attentive and polite ... away from hustle and bustle of the city ... water springs and stream water being a major attraction ... nice time we had ... Thanks

title: Decent place
review: One of the decent places and with green lush trees all around.

title: Just Average
review: Too small lake...not much worth of your quality time. I would only suggest if you have young kids (upto8 years may be) who want to do boating...not recommended for Adults.

title: good
review: this is nice and a bit crowdy place for hangout on weekend. try to go this place on week days definitely you will enjoy. i went on weekend so could not do much.

title: crowded place
review: It is around 30 minutes away from musoorie towards dehradun road .it is good place but space is taken by small shopkeepers.

title: Can be good
review: The place very poorly maintained but a nice place for peace and nature lovers .  Kids will have a great time

title: Gushing Streams
review: You can listen to the sound of gushing streams here. Numerous short flowing streams  merge into one and the water gushes down across rocks and stones. Dipping your feet in the cold water makes you feel relaxed

title: waterfall
review: favorite picnic spot among locals. many small water falls originates from kempty fall. walking along the fall is amazing one.

title: Pleasure
review: Lakemist is one of the best thing ever seen and enjoyed a lot in early morning was a pleasure to be here

title: Lakemist - private property - can be avoided
review: Lakemist is a private resort on way to Kempty Falls from Mussoorie. I am told that at one time it used to be a crowded place on week ends but due to some issue,  now it is not on the Tourist Point list of the Taxi Union. The property is poorly maintained and there is nothing much to see or enjoy except a small fresh water stream which runs through the property. The Boating pond is a big let down. No proper toilet facility for visitors, who have to pay charge for visiting the facility. I personally felt it was a waste of time, and would recommend to avoid.

title: Peaceful
review: This is a privately owned resort on the way to Kempty fall.  we stopped by and enjoyed peace and nature there.

title: average..Not recommended for old people
review: There are few places as attractions in Mussoorie...If you are on family vacation and want to just relax its great..This place has nothing much to offer..A small pool on which one can do boating..

title: Private property with a stream
review: This is a privately owned resort enroute the more famous Kempty Falls.

title: Average Place
review: This place is quite far from main road and can be said like duplicate Kempty Fall. You have option of boating and water activities too but it's a distant place and I didn't find much crowd around.

title: nice
review: its nice place with boating eating and adventure sports . its best enjoyed in the evening time. the activities like paragliding etc are a must do.

title: Nice lake
review: It's a nice calm lake with lots of natural beauty all around. Coupled with mussoorie's great weather, it's a great experience to spend some quiet quality time here.

title: Must Visit
review: It a drive from Mussoorie for nearly 30 - 40 minutes going downhill and towards Dehradun. Pedal boating is allowed and lots of people during the peak season. It gets very crowded.

title: avrege place
review: i visited here in jan 15.Place looking beautiful and atmosphere was good,but facility was not good,.

title: Beautiful, Secluded, not too maintained but pure natural beauty!
review: We loved to spend time here instead of hte over crowded and hyped kempty falls. the place has natural waterfall, boating and truly pure feel of nature all around. although it is not well maintained since suppossedly it has not really taken off too well commercially but it is a lovely place for peace and nature lovers.

title: Lush Green Valley
review: Its a gr88 place to be close to nature, situated on the kempty mussoorie road, but the inside valley give you wonderful view and u can feel the smell of nature

title: A Newly Developed Picnic Spot
review: Lake Mist is situated 5 KM before the famous Kempty Falls & is 10 KM away from Mussoorie...Its a newly developed scenic & picnic spot with good options of accommodation & restaurants...Its a newly developed lake with boating facility...

title: Thirty minutes journey to natures beauty
review: While going towards dehradun from Mussoorie a nearly thirty minutes driver takes you to lake mist. Not well maintained but a must visit place. You can enjoy alot of activities here

title: terrible place!
review: no one visits this place. and it is very mis-managed. the path through which they take to the waterfall is full of spider webs. the place where boating is done is horrible it is a concrete cavity filled with dirty water.

title: There is now space to stand outside the lake mist
review: Visited this place with my young kids, they were very much afraid to go inside the water but enjoying by seeing the fall and so many swimmer there. A good place made by nature but very much crowded by local shops. There is now space to stand outside the lake mist.

title: Good for Family trip
review: ......................Good for some family trip but for me it was not very interesting..... Above all Mussoorie is a place where you can walk the entire day enjoying the peaceful atmosphere and the Natural beauty of a Hill station....

title: okay
review: Nice calm lake, very good for honeymoon couples. Would have been great if they allow cars to go right upto the entrance as it is a good 200-300 meters walk from the main road

title: Nice little place of it's own
review: Lake mist is on the way to kempty falls; a quaint little place of it's own. 30-40 minutes of walk from Lake mist will take you to Dhobhi Ghat ... and the stream that provides water to Mussoorie

title: A hidden Gem
review: What a Beauty.. An absolute treasure .. After the terrible experience at Kempty falls we discovered this place.. for a charge of Rs. 100 per adult we could spend time in this wunnnderful location.. what a lovely small waterfall.. a rickety but thrilling ropeway bridge to cross over.. a let down was the paddle boating area.. The owners have really let the place down.. don't know what went wrong but there is zero maintenance.. Such a Beautiful location.. loads of money spent on it while developing the place I'm sure..but now totally forgotten by the owners and the tourists.. PLZZ RESTORE THIS PLACE.. It really needs it & I'm sure the returns will pour in it if marketed well.. All the Best to the Owner !!!

title: Mini Kempty Fall
review: This place actually replaces Kempty Fall. You can enjoy boating & water activites here as you can say that it is a newly developed Lake which allows you to reinstate the memories of old Kempty Fall.
